Report Abuse  
Posted By: Jake1991 (7/9/2010 9:10:37 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I tested this in a SUPER budget U/W deck made with bad draft leavings and, believe it or not, it was surprisingly good. It has a huge butt, and can absorb pretty much any burn played in the casual decks room, as well as attacks from most threats, it can kill a surprisingly large number of creatures while itself staying alive, and my opponents would refuse to send removal at it, so it survived and occasionally even got a kill. Overall, it's way better than I ever expected...  
That said, I replaced it with the strictly-better Siege Mastodon pretty quickly. And it did even better. I'm sure there's a message here, but I can't for the life of me figure out what it is.
posts.html:
I tested this in a SUPER budget U/W deck made with bad draft leavings and, believe it or not, it was surprisingly good. It has a huge butt, and can absorb pretty much any burn played in the casual decks room, as well as attacks from most threats, it can kill a surprisingly large number of creatures while itself staying alive, and my opponents would refuse to send removal at it, so it survived and occasionally even got a kill. Overall, it's way better than I ever expected...
That said, I replaced it with the strictly-better Siege Mastodon pretty quickly. And it did even better. I'm sure there's a message here, but I can't for the life of me figure out what it is.
